description:
Safe Genshin Impact mod with beautiful shaders, FPS unlocker, and 3DMigoto support.

Enhanced graphics, carefully crafted shaders, impressive FPS unlocking, and mods provide players with an even better gameplay experience than ever before. Rediscover the world of Teyvat with new visuals. A dedicated launcher streamlines the entire process, allowing players to jump into the action quickly and easily. Take your gameplay to the next level. Immerse yourself in the enhanced world of Teyvat and create unforgettable moments.
ðŸ“¥ Changelog for v8.9.0.0 from 18.01.2026
Miscellaneous
1. Migrated from VS2022 to VS2026.
2. Migrated from .NET 9 to .NET 10.
3. Removed RandomImages from Stella Mod Launcher.
4. Updated the copyright year to 2026.
FPS Unlocker
1.  Migrated from .NET 9 to .NET 10.
2.  Migrated from VS2022 to VS2026.
3.  Optimized game process detection: now uses GetProcessesByName instead of iterating through all processes.
4.  Changed the base type of the IpcStatus enum to sbyte for memory optimization.
5.  Fixed a handle leak in SetupForm.PollProcess(): process handles are now properly closed when the window does not belong to the game.
6.  Fixed a missing return in ViewConfig_Click: the application no longer attempts to open a non-existent configuration file.
7.  Removed multiple pieces of dead code and unused functions.
8.  Moved first-run tooltip logic to ConfigService.IsFirstRun: the tooltip now appears only when the configuration file does not exist (true first run).
9.  Improved error messages with clearer descriptions and actionable details.
10. Adjusted MessageBoxIcon types: Warning is used for validation errors, Error for critical failures.
11. Moved all hardcoded MessageBox strings to Resources to support localization.
12. Set DoubleBuffered to true for MainForm to improve rendering performance.
13. Minor refinements and various UI fixes in the Settings window.
14. Correctly adjusted Anchor settings for all forms to ensure proper scaling across different display resolutions.
Full Changelog: https://sefinek.net/genshin-stella-mod/docs?page=changelog_v8#ver-890
